statements.statement: SELECT BUTTON_ID , BUTTON_TXT_KR , BUTTON_TXT_EN , BUTTON_TXT_LO , BUTTON_FUNCTION , BUTTON_IDX , dbo.GET_COMM_DESC('USE_YN', USE_YN) AS USE_YN , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), REGIST_DATE, 121) AS REGIST_DATE , REGIST_USER_ID , CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), MODIFY_DATE, 121) AS MODIFY_DATE , MODIFY_USER_ID FROM MES_BUTTON_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BUTTON_ID LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #BUTTON_ID# = '' THEN BUTTON_ID ELSE #BUTTON_ID# END) + '%' AND ( BUTTON_TXT_KR LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #BUTTON_NM# = '' THEN BUTTON_TXT_KR ELSE #BUTTON_NM# END) + '%' OR BUTTON_TXT_EN LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #BUTTON_NM# = '' THEN BUTTON_TXT_EN ELSE #BUTTON_NM# END) + '%' OR BUTTON_TXT_LO LIKE '%' + (CASE WHEN #BUTTON_NM# = '' THEN BUTTON_TXT_LO ELSE #BUTTON_NM# END) + '%' ) ORDER BY REGIST_DATE DESC
SELECT BUTTON_ID , BUTTON_TXT_KR , BUTTON_TXT_EN , BUTTON_TXT_LO , BUTTON_FUNCTION , BUTTON_IDX , USE_YN FROM MES_BUTTON_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BUTTON_ID = #BUTTON_ID#
SELECT BUTTON_ID , BUTTON_TXT_KR , BUTTON_TXT_EN , BUTTON_TXT_LO , BUTTON_FUNCTION FROM MES_BUTTON_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY BUTTON_IDX
SELECT COUNT(BUTTON_ID) AS VAL_CHK FROM MES_BUTTON_MA WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE BUTTON_ID = #BUTTON_ID#

MERGE INTO MES_BUTTON_MA AS A USING (SELECT #BUTTON_ID#) AS B (BUTTON_ID) ON (A.BUTTON_ID = B.BUTTON_ID) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET A.BUTTON_TXT_KR = #BUTTON_TXT_KR# , A.BUTTON_TXT_EN = #BUTTON_TXT_EN# , A.BUTTON_TXT_LO = #BUTTON_TXT_LO# , A.BUTTON_FUNCTION = #BUTTON_FUNCTION# , A.BUTTON_IDX = #BUTTON_IDX# , A.USE_YN = #USE_YN# , A.MODIFY_DATE = GETDATE() , A.MODIFY_USER_ID = #REG_ID# WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT( BUTTON_ID, BUTTON_TXT_KR, BUTTON_TXT_EN, BUTTON_TXT_LO, BUTTON_FUNCTION, BUTTON_IDX, USE_YN, REGIST_DATE, REGIST_USER_ID, MODIFY_DATE, MODIFY_USER_ID ) VALUES ( #BUTTON_ID#, #BUTTON_TXT_KR#, #BUTTON_TXT_EN#, #BUTTON_TXT_LO#, #BUTTON_FUNCTION#, #BUTTON_IDX#, #USE_YN#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID#, GETDATE(), #REG_ID# );
